KGCS Schools Closed Remainder of 2019-2020 SY

div.img: Like all schools in the Commonwealth of Virginia, King George County Schools are closed. Student learning is only one of the many evolving challenges that our families are facing in this uncertain time. Families are invited to continue academic practice during the closure using the resources suggested below. The health and well-being of our families remain our highest priority.
